projectsDetails.title: Data lover
projectsDetails.description: Data lover is a responsive web application created to display data about the world of Harry Potter. It allows the user to view, filter, and order data regarding the saga in a friendly way.

projectsDetails.title: Go Wild Nature
projectsDetails.description: Go wild Nature is a social network (Single Page Application) for lovers of sports and outdoor activities. It allows you to create an account, log in and post on the wall in real time.

projectsDetails.title: Oranga App
projectsDetails.description: Oranga app is a mobile application created to order organic and seasonal vegetables locally, with the option of delivery to your home.

projectsDetails.title: Deja Burg
projectsDetails.description: Application for a fast food restaurant. The goal is to create an interface for waiters and kitchen staff.

projectsDetails.title: Lezza
projectsDetails.description: Leeza is an online store created for the sale of sustainable metal and glass bottles. In this project I had the objective of defining the brand and the general design.

projectsDetails.title: Pet Sitter
projectsDetails.description: Pet sitter is a mobile application created to get free stays in the world taking care of the hosts' pets while they travel.
